content.prompt: The calling of the Estates-General in France by King Louis XVI in 1789 was the direct result of

choices.label: France's defeats in the Seven Years' War by Great Britain
the impact of the ideology advocated in the American Revolution
the failure of the Assembly of Notables to endorse the monarch's program of tax reform
the recommendation by the French Director General of Finance, Jacques Necker

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
